item.title: Running postfix 3.0
item.description: Postfix 3.0 stable was released a few days ago (Feb 8). I run a few personal mailservers and decided it would be good if I were to upgrade the one running on Fedora21 (postfix + mysql + spamass-milter + greylisting), This would be a deviation as I would be compling it from source, and who knows what would break with 3.0! Here is a very brief update to what I did to get it working on Fedora 21: {% highlight bash %} yum remove postfix -y wget ftp://postfix.
